backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two implemented frontend features and their related files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend components and config files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light/dark modes using OKLCH color values.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component assembling all page sections including photos and contact info.
Mobile-only sticky call bar that appears after scrolling and links to the emergency phone number.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Contact section with phone actions, service hours, service area, and reasons to choose the towing service.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with company info, quick contact, services list, and attribution logic.
frontend/src/components/HeaderNav.tsx: Header navigation with smooth scrolling, logo, desktop/mobile menus, and call button.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Renders the hero section with a background image, title, description, call-to-action buttons, and quick info cards for the towing service.
frontend/src/components/PhotosSection.ts: Displays a photo gallery section showing towing service images using a responsive grid of cards.
frontend/src/components/ServiceAreaSecti: Shows service coverage information for various areas in Nellore with descriptive text and a list of covered locations.
Lists the towing services offered using icon cards and includes a phone call-to-action for immediate assistance.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and utilities for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and stored identity restoration.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables for theming, including light and dark modes and shared section styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the app by wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers and mounting it to the DOM.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Defines current project state, implemented features, pending requests, and overall requirements for the PMK TOWING SERVICE website.
